ClassDef.Name: Tool

Properties.Name: Droppable
Properties.Description: Determines whether the tool can be dropped by the player.

Properties.Name: Holder
Properties.Description: Determines who is currently holding this tool.

Methods.Name: Activate
Methods.Description: Activates the tool, similarly to pressing the mouse button.

Methods.Name: Deactivate
Methods.Description: Deactivates the tool, similarly to releasing the mouse button.

Methods.Name: PlayAnimation
Methods.Description: Plays the specified animation on the holder of the tool.

Events.Name: Equipped
Events.Description: Fires when this tool has been equipped

Events.Name: Unequipped
Events.Description: Fires when this tool has been unequipped

Events.Name: Activated
Events.Description: Fires when this tool has been activated (via mouse press or `Tool:Activate`)

Events.Name: Deactivated
Events.Description: Fires when this tool has been deactivated (via mouse release or `Tool:Deactivate`)

ClassDef.Description: Tools are objects that can be held by the player.
